synopsis:
A quaint kitchen in a house tucked away in the outskirts of the city. Amidst preparations for a banquet, the birth of a new life brings turmoil and change. And then, she heads off on her own journey. Those who send her off recall the day they embarked on their own journeys, just like her.

Graduate Work 2014, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

2014 TOHO Cinemas Student Film Festival, Grand Prix of Short Animation 2014 32th Blue Wing Awards 2014 31th Chicago International Children’s Film Festival, Children's Jury Prize—Animated Short Film 2014 Toyama Waterfront Film Festival Sphere, Excellence Award 2014 18th Japan Media Arts Festival, Jury Selections 2015 10th Annual Children’s Film Festival Seattle, Best of Children’s Film Festival Seattle 2015 2015 Miyagi Sendai Animation Grand Prix 2015, Outstanding performance award 2015 TIFF Kids International Film Festival 2015, Adult Jury Award for Best Animated Short Film

(Source: Geidai Animation)
